加州大学圣地亚哥分校的研究人员发现了预测乳腺癌传播的新方法通过评估加利福尼亚大学圣地亚哥分校的研究人员找到了一种预测患者早期乳腺癌是否可能扩散的潜在方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/uc-san-diego-researchers-discover-new-way-way-way-way-predict-breast-cancer-cancer-spread-spread-by-assessing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/uc-san-diego-researchers-discover-new-way-way-way-way-to-predict-breast-cancer-cancer-spread-spread-spread-spread-sassessing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=70EC2F24-68D7-4D64-BFF2-E799CCC929F1A Wed, 05 Mar 2025 23:20:00 -0500 UC San Diego researchers discover new way to predict breast cancer spread
TUM科学家使用紫外线开发新的蛋白质纯化方法蛋白质在生命科学中起关键作用 - 从基础研究和生物技术应用到制药的开发和制造。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/tum-scientists-develop-new-protein-purotein-purotein-method-ius-us-uv-light.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/tum-scientists-develop-new-protein-purotein-purotein-purification-method-using-us-uv-light.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9327E7D4-F66F-4428-A0C2-CE21F4588329 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 23:08:36 -0500 TUM scientists develop new protein purification method using UV light
神经科学家赢得了2025年大脑奖的开创性研究神经胶质瘤是大脑中出现的癌症的类型，并且非常难以治疗。它们是儿童和成人脑肿瘤相关死亡的主要原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/neuroscientists-win-the-the-brain-prize-2025-for-pioneering-research-research-into-brain-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/neuroscientists-win-the-the-brain-prize-2025-for-pioneering-research-research-into-brain-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=86255E5A-AE4A-425F-9E8B-D69E3D7D4E29 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 22:59:49 -0500 Neuroscientists win The Brain Prize 2025 for pioneering research into brain cancer
慢性压力可能会给年轻女性带来中风的风险美国神经病学医学杂志在线上发表的一项研究，有些人承受慢性压力的人的中风风险更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/chronic-stress-may-raise-naise-naise-rase-risk-for-younger-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/chronic-stress-may-raise-naise-naise-rase-risk-for-younger-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=D54BC9D-1A0B-4BE4-8DB0-1378AA5C1DB6 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 21:50:00 -0500 Chronic stress may raise stroke risk for younger women
非处方止痛药可能会缩短脑震荡恢复时间根据今天于2025年3月5日发布的初步研究，在脑震荡之后服用非处方止痛药的人可能比不服用止痛药的人更快地恢复。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/over-the-counter-pain-medications-may-shorten-concussion-recovery time.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/over-the-counter-pain-medications-may-shorten-concussion-recovery time.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5DAC80F8-C61C-459A-459A-AFF2-43F2-43F0B8623CFD Wed, 05 Mar 2025 21:47:13 -0500 Over-the-counter pain medications may shorten concussion recovery time
靶向纳米颗粒在防止胰腺癌扩散到肝脏方面显示出希望胰腺癌仍然是治疗最具挑战性的肿瘤之一，部分原因是当该疾病已经扩散或转移时，通常在晚期发现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/targeted-nanoparticles-show-promise-inpomise-in-in-pancreatic-cancreatic-cancer-cancer-cancer-spread-the-liver.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/targeted-nanoparticles-show-promise-inpomise-in-parmise-in-pancreatic-pancreatic-cancer-cancer-cancer-spread-to-the-liver.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ccddc2d-67dd-43bf-9354-62c9aeae1c468c Wed, 05 Mar 2025 21:43:14 -0500 Targeted nanoparticles show promise in preventing pancreatic cancer spread to the liver
早产儿的喂养策略不会改变大脑的生长或认知尽管最初的未经调整的关联，但在遵循标准化的临床指南时，早产儿的早期营养并不会显着影响大脑的生长或神经发育。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/feeding-strategies-in-prategies-in-preterm-infants-not-not-alter-alter-alter-brain-brain-browth-or-cognition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/feeding-strategies-in-prategies-in-preterm-infant--infant-do-not-alter-alter-alter-brain-brain-growth-or-cognition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4611f640-1EF1-4C9D-853F-853F-8E4C6B90A3B7 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 21:43:00 -0500 Feeding strategies in preterm infants do not alter brain growth or cognition
预测显示，到2050年，帕金森氏病病例将达到2520万到2050年，全世界将有2520万人患有帕金森氏病（与2021年相比增长112％），这主要是由于人口衰老，这表明BMJ今天发表的一项建模研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/projections-show-parkinsons-disease-cases-cases-will-rach-rach-25.2 ill-2055 by-2050.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/projections-show-parkinsons-disease-cases-cases-cases-will-rach-reach-25.2亿乘25.52亿，by-2050.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8Adc96f9-f010-48fa-A51D-B851EE487C08 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 21:36:42 -0500 Projections show Parkinson's disease cases will reach 25.2 million by 2050
糖尿病药物可以减少癌症幸存者的心力衰竭根据东英吉利大学的新研究，一种常见的糖尿病药物可以帮助癌症患者更好地康复。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/diabetes-drug-could-reduce-hend-failure-in-cancer-survivors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/diabetes-drug-could-reduce-hend-failure-in-cancer-survivors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=23b8e9e5-fb06-4248-87e1-47855af262478 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 21:23:00 -0500 Diabetes drug could reduce heart failure in cancer survivors
碳水化合物不是饥饿罪魁祸首：新的研究推翻了血糖指数驱动暴饮暴食的信念一项细胞代谢研究发现，虽然高gi餐峰值胰岛素和葡萄糖，但它们不会增加饥饿或持续驱动暴饮暴食，从而挑战了碳水化合物 - 胰岛素模型对肥胖的中心主张。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/carbs-arene28099t-the-hunger-culprit-culprit-new-research-vorearch-vorearch-overturns-belief-that------------------------ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/carbs-arene28099t-the-hunger-culprit-new-research-research-vorearch-overturns-belief-that----------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A8C09F25-6C47-4957-4957-938F-9EEB1C0AD5B1 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 21:19:00 -0500 Carbs aren’t the hunger culprit: New research overturns belief that glycemic index drives overeating
